review: This product, the 7th Roku I have installed over the past 5 years or so, was incredibly disappointing. I should have paid more attention to the negative reviews and the experiences related elsewhere online. If it were just defective, that would be one thing. But the way in which it failed  resembled so many others' experiences, I have to think it is a design defect. The stick would fail to make a connection with the WiFi, or it would do that, but fail to get an internet connection, or do that and fail to do the next step (able to get to addresses?), or it would get that far and then fail to contact Roku.com... I tried all the of the suggestions on the web (e.g. turn off ping, reset Roku, reboot router), but no help. Bought a Roku 2 from Amazon for next day delivery, hooked it into the same system, and it came up instantly, did a firmware update, connected to the mother ship, etc. etc. No problem, as always before. Worse still, the box it came in had little tears around where the round cellophane "this has been opened" sticker goes to close the box. So the box was opened before, and then closed by someone (Roku? Amazon?) before being shipped. One can only imagine the cause. Ugh.
